RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 22400. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 30 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 30 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PISTOL PACKIN BOS broke in full stride to set all the pace and maintained her advantage under a strong hand ride. CHLOES ANGEL chased the winner two wide and finished second best. DOUBLE EDGED chased the winner along the inside and went evenly. SARAH JANE failed to menace. LARSA had brief speed.

ENTRY.NAME: Pistol Packin Bos
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, held well, strong hand ride

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 29. Maiden Claiming Purse 17000. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.

CLAIM.OWNER: Yoder Susan and Rivera Alan Yahir

RACE.FOOTNOTES: HAUGHTY PRAISE prompted the pace two wide, was carried out to the five path entering the stretch, responded under mild left handed urging to make the lead before the furlong marker and finished full of run to win going away. HOLLYS SUPER STAR made the lead soon after the start, set a pressured pace along the inside, dirfted out to the four path entering the stretch then was no match for the winner while just hanging on for second two wide. MOST ADORABLE stalked the pace from the start and finished with good courage along the rail to just miss getting up for second. SEE YA SISTA failed to menace. EXTRA CRAFTY trailed early, improved position in the four path on the turn then came up empty. BOOKMASTER had brief speed.

ENTRY.NAME: Hollys Super Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pressured pace is, drifted 4path, held place,

ENTRY.NAME: Haughty Praise
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, carried 5path, rallied left urging, clear

ENTRY.NAME: Extra Crafty
ENTRY.OWNER: Poe Racing Stable LLC and 8 and 3 Racing LLC

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 27500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 30 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 30 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PLAY BALL vied for the lead early three wide, rallied two wide to make the lead past mid turn, driftde to the four path entering the stretch, was put to mild right handed urging and edged clear. POWERFUL PHIL trailed into the stretch then rallied outside rivals to finish second best. GALACTIC broke in front, set the pace along the inside until the middle of the turn then was outfinished. MUTINY went evenly.

ENTRY.NAME: Powerful Phil
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, rallied late outside, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Play Ball
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 3w, rallied 2 wide turn, drifted 4path, edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Galactic
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace late turn, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 15500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 30 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 30 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WARHORSE WEST sprinted up the inside to make the lead shortly after the start, set a pressured pace into the stretch, shook clear, was struck once right handed near the furlong marker and won in hand. MARSICO pressured the winner two wide but was no match. DON'T CROSS JACK moved up three wide through the turn then leveled off. NAPA DUDE was no factor. ARMOR PIERCING allowed to settle, moved closer along the rail into the stretch then came up empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Warhorse West
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, shook clear, handily,

ENTRY.NAME: Marsico
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Don't Cross Jack
ENTRY.OWNER: Tooley Jennifer and Dolce Vita Farm

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 12200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE AUGUST 30, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 30 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 30 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foa ls Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MON CAMO away alertly, set all the pace and widened through the stretch to win as much the best while being ridden out. KHALFANI chased the winner along the inside through the turn, angled out to the five path and was no while clear for second. TUFF ATTACK stalked the pace three wide and lacked the needed response. KOSCIUSZKO hopped at the start and was no threat. CALL WEST was outrun. DOMI was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Mon Camo
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, drew off, much the best, ridden out,

ENTRY.NAME: Tuff Attack
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3 wide, failed to respond,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 51. Allowance Purse 35800. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 30 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 30 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LITTLE TOY GUNS stalked the pace three wide through the turn, drifted to the six path entering the stretch, rallied under left handed urging to make the lead before the furlong marker, drifted into the three path inside the eighth pole and drew off. OVERLOAD dueled for the lead two wide into the stretch, was shut off just past the eighth pole causing his rider to check, shifted outward then finished second best. JOHN PHILIP slow early, found his best stride late in the four path. COLOR BEARER dueled for the lead along the inside into the stretch and weakened late. MUSIC GEM was outrun. LITTLE RONS ROCKET stumbled badly at the start and was no threat. THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN AND THE RIDER OF OVERLOAD LODGED A CLAIM OF FOUL AGAINST THE RIDER OF THE WINNER FOR INTERFERENCE IN THE STRETCH. AFTER REVIEW THE STEWARDS DISQUALIFIED LITTLE TOY GUNS AND PLACED HIM SECOND.

ENTRY.NAME: Overload
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2 wide, shut off past 1/8p, checked, jockey claimed foul

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Little Toy Guns
ENTRY.OWNER: Tooley Jennifer and Beckett Racing Team LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w,drifted 6p top lane, took over, drifted in past 1/8p, drew off

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 54. Allowance Purse 35800. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 30 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since June 30 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DANES HEART broke in front, set all the pace unchallenged and won as much the best under right handed urging. WATCHOUTFORWEAVER unhurried early, closed willingly through the stretch two wide and finished second best. CHILTEPIN chased the winner two wide then along the inside and went evenly. INDY CARR failed to menace. PLAYING BALL was outrun. MARCH MAGIC chased the winner for six furlongs then stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Danes Heart
ENTRY.OWNER: McFadden Jr Joseph A and Fewster Melody K
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, unchallenged, much the best,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Mr. & Mrs. Joseph A. McFadden Jr. & Mr.& Mrs. Melody K. Fe

ENTRY.NAME: Watchoutforweaver
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, closed willingly, 2 wide, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 98. Allowance Purse 31400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OPTIONAL, STARTER, OR STATE BRED IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 30 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since June 30 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WICKED WARRIOR opened a daylgiht lead soon after the start, turned back bids from multipple opponents at the quarter pole, was put to left handed urging in upper stretch and drew off late under confident handling. OUTLIER stalked the early pace, loomed boldly three wide at the quarter pole, was carried out to the six path entering the stretech and finished clear for second. BEER CHASER chased the winner two wide, drew on near even terms for the lead at the quarter pole, drifted to the five path and weakened late. BOURBON WISDOM failed to menace. SHY GUY was no threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Wicked Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside pace, repulsed bid 1/4pole, dug in gamely left urging

ENTRY.NAME: Beer Chaser
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, bid 2 wide 1/4 pole, drifted path, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Outlier
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, loomed boldly 3 wide 1/4 pole, no match for winner,
